title: Flexbox
content: # Containers * If the items inside a container don't fit when the screen is shrunk they will shrink, if there's enough space they will render in the prefefined size. ### Wrapping * Flex-wrap: Wrap - Makes items in container appear in new line * Flex-wrap: Wrap-Reverse - Makes items in container appear in new line but reversed ## Flex Short Hand `flex-flow`: `column`, `wrap` ## Design Patterns https://tobiasahlin.com/blog/common-flexbox-patterns/ ## Vertical Stretch Behavior
